## Summary of the new feature/enhancement

Currently the tests in `HelpSystem.OnlineHelp.Tests.ps1` verify that the help URI is specified for selected commands.  Please add a test that the content behind that URI contains online help for that command (not an error and not any bogus irrelevant stuff).

## Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

1. `Invoke-WebRequest` on the URI.
2. If request failed, skip test.
3. Assert that the request status is OK.
4. Assert that the retrieved content contains the command name.
